meanings.sent1: She overplied herself at the gym and ended up exhausted.
meanings.sent2: He overplied during the exam, trying to answer every question quickly.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel overplied gathering nuts, forgetting where it hid them.
meanings.sent4: The engine overplied, struggling to keep up with the steep hill.
meanings.sent5: The chef overplied the dough, making it tough and chewy.

meanings.sent1: The overplied student had assignments due in every class.
meanings.sent2: She felt overplied with work and responsibilities.
meanings.sent3: The overplied computer crashed under the weight of too many programs.
meanings.sent4: The overplied backpack burst open from the weight of books.
meanings.sent5: The overplied schedule left no time for relaxation or fun.

meanings.sent1: The overplied soap left a residue on the dishes.
meanings.sent2: He felt the overplied use of cologne was overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The overplied seasoning made the dish too salty to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her overplied makeup looked caked and unnatural.
meanings.sent5: The overplied fertilizer harmed the plants instead of helping them grow.
